note.p: Birth: Neemuch [ie Nimach], Madhya Pradesh, Bharat, India (28 October 1835): Death: Kew, Surrey (30 September 1898)

Career: Assistant Surgeon, HEIC (1858); collected plants of the Punjab and Sind; served in Afghanistan and collected specimens; Naturalist to the Afghan delimitation commission; Surgeon Major (by 1882); retired at rank of Brigade Surgeon (1888); died of heart problems
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1898-1899 vol 64 pp xi-xiii signed by W B H
